The Area.Name representing the Area embedded within the AreaMetric
Area - Class in bytemusketeers.heslingtonhustle.scene
An Area is a single room or outdoor scene in which the player can exist, containing its own TiledMap texture and set of Interactable objects.
Area - bytemusketeers.heslingtonhustle.metrics.MetricController.Metric

AreaFactory - Class in bytemusketeers.heslingtonhustle.scene
The AreaFactory provides a non-static factory for initialising particular Area objects, populated with Interactable objects

AreaMetric - Class in bytemusketeers.heslingtonhustle.metrics
An AreaMetric represents an Area as a MetricEntry to be managed by the MetricController
